Hello, my name is Robert.

I am a Web Developer.

About me

Proficient in front end technologies, and gaining more experience in the back end. Technologies I am currently using include: React, Redux, NodeJS, and NextJS. With a passion for programming and a penchant for learning, I am looking to further build my career in the software industry.
